GSD.description:
scsi: lpfc: Prevent buffer overflow crashes in debugfs with malformed user input

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 2d544e9d19c109dfe34b3dc1253a8b2971abe060. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: lpfc: Prevent buffer overflow crashes in debugfs with malformed user input
